A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Leave the past behind-- shhhh**** I wish I could leave The Last Jedi behind.

I get they are trying to make another generation of movies. Call it something else. Don't call it Star Wars. We already saw the hermit Jedi master(Yoda). Why couldn't they make Luke a bad ass Jedi master. After all\, 6 movies revolve around his character.

Even Mark Hamil didn't like the way Luke was headed. Check out the vanity fair article.

Now that Luke is dead\, Hamil can really tell us how he feels. Which I think he will eventually.

Mary Poppins act was lame. 
Casino scenes were not necessary.
Purple hair commander vs Poe was lame. Poe went from hero to crazy guy. Why? 

I should have realized this was bad when Rian Johnson said he was a big fan of the prequels.

Most famous line: " I got a bad feeling about this" was missing. No wonder\, the director didn't want any actors to say it. It would be used in EVERY review.

All I hope now is Disney (Fox purchase) doesn't screw up Avatar\, but lucky for us avatar may be too far along to have any major changes.
